effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability can pull targets restrained by Petrifying Eye Beams, and ignores stability if it does so.
The tonguesnapper targets two additional creatures or objects.

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: The area extends from both the tonguesnapper's eyes, and this ability targets the first creature without cover on either side of the area.

effects.tier3: Slowed (save ends); or if A<2 restrained (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If a target is already slowed, the potency increases by 1 for that target. A target restrained this way magically begins to turn to stone, and a target who ends two consecutive turns restrained this way is petrified. A target restrained this way or a creature adjacent to them can use a main action to cut encroaching stone from the target's body, dealing 8 damage to the target that can't be reduced in any way and ending this effect.

effects.tier3: 14 corruption damage; R<2 dazed and slowed (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A creature dazed this way can't benefit from edges or double edges and can't gain or use surges.

items.name: Neurotoxin Splash
items.trigger: The tonguesnapper takes damage from a melee ability.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target takes 4 acid damage. Any target who has M<2 is also slowed (save ends).
Any creature who starts their turn adjacent to the tonguesnapper and has M<1 is slowed (save ends).
